Text: Rather than download the nfo file, why not include the imdb reference like so many other folks do. Is it really that hard or time consuming? Don't get me wrong, your uploads are appreciated. It just seems such an EASY thing to do...

@ shamanist ,Sigourney Weaver and Kate Bosworth in a movie about a womans 3 yr. old daughter being missing 15 years ago has been enduringly traumatized by it she secluded herself from her family and friends.

Yeah, I agree. I'm not dissin, but it's not that fucking hard to put it in the description and instead of 10000 people have to go and search, everybody can view it instantly. I hope the logic comes through to you.
